@CertusCC @ashsmith43 @Torgoch @EnvAgency @NatResWales @Feargal_Sharkey @RiverActionUK @wrurestore @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca It's like calling in the mafia godfathers and asking them to tone down the mass killings for a few weeks. tweets.text:
Time once again to remind the @EnvAgency board about their obligations as public appointees (PA) and what the PA Code of Conduct says about things such as leadership, openness and accountability.

@BBCPanorama @10DowningStreet @cabinetofficeuk https://t.co/IP3L8GmPwj https://t.co/cuXZ7chVFg

@tayz_BETH @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe I know it's appalling & if they ask what the weather is, I will scream, it's cold, almost a sigh, no wonder your house smells of bad eggs, it's hot, well no wonder your house stinks , it's raining o there you go bound to stink of bad eggs, #Panorama #stopthestink #capitoff

tweets.text: @dpcarrington @guardian #walleysquarry #landfill has had 11.5k complaints to @EnvAgency in 2021 alone. Easily the most important environmental issue in the UK now. The toxic gases are getting into hospitals, schools, homes and causing health problems. Please help! #stopthestink

tweets.text: Am I missing something here, how can regulatory bodies decline to be interviewed about companies breaking the law?? @EnvAgency @NatResWales  @Feargal_Sharkey @RiverActionUK  @wrurestore

20min wait to get through to someone this morning.. I wonder why that is @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency? #STOPTHESTINK 

Thank you to Jonathon for taking my call this morning. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UK7Ca1nlbe

Never in my life in the UK did I think fresh air would be a luxury but this is our life now in #newcastleunderlyme A family member has taken me to get the freshest air because where I live cant provide us with that anymore.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #STOPTHESTINK https://t.co/Dv2UXf6ZbA

tweets.text:
Trying to have some time to myself now my child‚Äôs in bed.

3months pregnant also and having to deal with the stink in my own home. Where is my HUMAN RIGHT to clean, fresh air? There is no escape. 
#stopthestink 

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC https://t.co/FhlAS7fzWz

All answers on a postcard or even Tweeter, DM etc. 

Don't forget to mention the @EnvAgency and the endless Kms of rivers they "Enhance". What does that mean?

Obviously add the water industry and the supposed ¬£5Bn spend on the environment. What exactly is that spent on? https://t.co/j3IAIzYXEU

@Feargal_Sharkey @WaterUK CEO Christine McGourty dug an even bigger hole for her members by failing to justify how water cos were breaking the law by illegally dumping raw sewage, but @JamesBevanEA didn‚Äôt even turn up. @EnvAgency is a key player but loses all credibility thru their silence

The @EnvAgency hadn‚Äôt turned them on - it‚Äôs not just the site that‚Äôs starting to stink üò≥
Has news covered this? Surely it‚Äôs a story where questions should be asked of the agency and council? https://t.co/aEgjoNDBUO
@CertusCC @WaterUK @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency You mean they had any credibility left?

@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency The council were unanimous in their call for work to stop at the quarry and also into an enquiry into the Environment Agency‚Äôs effectiveness. There also needs to be proper data collection on health concerns and they need to stop gaslighting the people of Newcastle and beyond.

Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd
@Vig79 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/mSB4CwjDEg

üö® 'The River Pollution Scandal' is airing now on @BBCOne.üö®

Tune in and let us know your thoughts about the investigation by using the #BBCPanorama hashtag or replying to this tweet. ‚Üì https://t.co/uL7wLh0RiQ

tweets.text: @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA  Do you have ANY idea how the stink from Walleys quarry is affecting our mental health never mind physical? I‚Äôm going through the menopause and to not being able to open a window in the night is torture!we need fresh air!@StinkStopthe
